com.synaptics.addressing
Class Address

java.lang.Object
  com.synaptics.addressing.Address
Direct Known Subclasses:
BitAddress
public class Address
extends java.lang.Object

This class represents an address in program or data memory. Although this is usually used to represent a 16-bit word address on a T100x family processor, it is not tied to a particular size of addressing units. To address an individual bit or bits within the addressed unit, use the BitAddress class.

See Also:
BitAddress
